block.p: $615,000 30 East Ninth Street (Lafayette) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, 8 1/2-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,240, 56% tax-deductible; listed at $600,000 (multiple bids), 29 weeks on market (broker: Ashforth Warburg)

$615,000 30 East Ninth Street (Lafayette) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, 8 1/2-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,240, 56% tax-deductible; listed at $600,000 (multiple bids), 29 weeks on market (broker: Ashforth Warburg)

$645,000 77 Seventh Avenue (15th St.) (Vermeer) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, galley kitchen with two entrances, 8-ft. ceilings, 2 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $1,051, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $695,000, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$1.5 million 220 East 65th Street (Concorde) 3-bedroom, 4-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. penthouse condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, marble baths, balcony; common charge $1,141, taxes $21,324; listed at $1.5 million, 7 weeks on market (brokers: A. J. Clarke; Halstead Property Co.)

$745,000 2250 Broadway (82nd St.) (Broadway) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, west and south exposures, private garden, gym in building; common charge $738, taxes $7,296; listed at $749,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$550,000 120 West 70th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; windowed kitchen, 9-ft. ceilings, parquet floors, garden views; maintenance $770, 44% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Klara Madlin Real Estate; Halstead Property Co.)

$430,000 2521 Palisade Avenue (La Rive) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, marble baths, whirlpool bath, balcony, Hudson River view, heated pool and sauna in building; common charge $1,150, taxes $2,271; listed at $430,000, 1 week on market (brokers: Sandra Silverman Real Estate; Anita Wolfe Real Estate)

$510,000 142 78th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old attached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, decorative fireplace, hardwood floors, 1-car garage, 27-by-109-ft. lot; taxes $2,460; listed at $525,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Century 21/Demasi Realty)

$859,000 438 Seventh Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 5 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining room, fireplace, dishwasher, washer/dryer, rear deck in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; parquet floors, original moldings and detail in each; rear garden, 16.8-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,045; listed at $859,000, 1 week on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$480,000 80 Westminster Road 8-bedroom, 95-year-old colonial style; 3 full and 2 half baths, dining room, 2 fireplaces, original detail, 500 sq. ft. of professional office space on first floor, 76-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,340; listed at $524,000, 1 week on market (broker: Wilk Real Estate)

$425,000 32-18 172nd Street 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sunroom, living room with cathedral ceilings, screened porch, balcony, 2-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,376; listed at $399,888 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$1.45 million 17 Hook Road 6-bedroom, 2-year-old colonial style; 4 full and 2 half baths, 2-story entry hall, dining room, family room, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 0.92-acre lot; taxes $20,000; listed at $1.495 million, 3 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

$500,000 377 Main Street (Kings Grant) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,826-sq.-ft. town house condo in a 28-year-old building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, family room, 2-car garage, central air-conditioning; common charge $250, taxes $6,365; listed at $579,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
